item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library
Mass Ave
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor: 

Last Minute Sponsor....

Pingo.com International calling cards 

Join Pingo's affiliate program and earn up to a $35.00 CPA for each $1 trial sale. 

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 7:50

"Content Marketing" will be the theme for the night with both speakers

 

1st Guest Speaker

Nick Stamoulis
President
Brick Marketing

See presentation topic at his seo blog post review 

Nick Stamoulis is the President and Founder of Brick Marketing. With over 12 years of experience Nick Stamoulis has worked with hundreds of companies small, large and every size in between. Through his vast and diverse SEO, search engine marketing and internet marketing experience Nick Stamoulis has successfully increased the ?online visibility and sales of clients in all industries.

As a way to share his extensive knowledge about SEO and search engine marketing, Nick Stamoulis currently writes daily in his SEO blog, the Search Engine Optimization Journal (or SEO Journal) which has grown to become one of the top SEO blogs in the search engine optimization and search engine marketing industry. Nick Stamoulis started speaking at some of the industry conferences and trade shows, such as: PubCon, MarketingProfs B2B Forum, American Marketing Association (AMA) Webcasts, eMarketing Association Conference, ?Boston SEO Meetup, eBusiness Symposium, SEMPO Boston "Ask The Experts" and many others.

Nick Stamoulis spends his time working with clients, writing in his blog, publishing the Brick Marketing SEO newsletter (read by over 120,000 opt-in subscribers!) and also finds time to write about SEO in some of the top other online publications, such as:?
Search Engine Journal, Yahoo! Search Marketing Blog, Marketing Pilgrim, Add Me, Boston AMA Blog, Website Magazine, Talent Zoo, Site Pro News, Promotion World, Search Marketing Insider Newsletter and many others.

7:50 to 8:10 2nd Guest Speaker

Suzanne McDonald

President | Chief Content Strategist

 Blog.DesignatedEditor.com

Check out slides of her presentation online 

About Suzanne

15 years' newspaper experience, most recently six years at The Boston Globe. Since 2008, Suzanne's deep dives include Search Engine Optimization and Social Media; currently dipping into Usability, Mobile & Behavioral. Suzanne's philosophy -- the user experience drives results -- was "like being in the choir" at OMMA Behavioral and at South by Southwest Interactive.

  • Founded Newport Interactive Marketers: fostering networking & knowledge in Rhode Island
  • Co-founded WordPress Providence Meetup: a resource for developers, bloggers & beyond
  • Edited, designed, and managed The Boston Globe's Calendar section
  • Tested and implemented numerous platforms to create Boston.com's interactive events
  • Page 1 Editor at The Patriot Ledger, edited and designed 3 front pages daily
  • Master's in Mass Communications & Journalism from the University of South Carolina
  • In-depth environmental and community reporter for award-winning Cape newspapers
  • Editor-in-Chief of campus weekly newspaper, managed staff of 40 unpaid students
  • Supplemental fun: traveling & writing, running, sailing, wine, "Mad Men" & Wired magazine

 

8:10 to 8:30 Open Q&A

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Internet Marketing Networking Event
